verses.verse: <WG2532> After <WG3326> this <WG5023> I saw <WG1492> four <WG5064> angels <WG32> standing <WG2476> at <WG1909> the four <WG5064> corners <WG1137> of the earth <WG1093>, holding <WG2902> the four <WG5064> winds <WG417> of the earth <WG1093>, that <WG2443> no <WG3361> wind <WG417> should blow <WG4154> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>, or <WG3383> on <WG1909> the sea <WG2281>, or <WG3383> upon <WG1909> any <WG3956> tree <WG1186>.

saying <WG3004>, Hurt <WG91> not <WG3361> the earth <WG1093>, neither <WG3383> the sea <WG2281>, nor <WG3383> the trees <WG1186>, till891, 3739 we shall have sealed <WG4972> the servants <WG1401> of our <WG2257> God <WG2316> on <WG1909> their <WG846> foreheads <WG3359>.

And <WG2532> I heard <WG191> the number <WG706> of them <WG3588> that were sealed <WG4972>, a hundred <WG1540> and forty <WG5062> and four <WG5064> thousand <WG5505>, sealed <WG4972> out of <WG1537> every <WG3956> tribe <WG5443> of the children <WG5207> of Israel <WG2474>:

Of <WG1537> the tribe <WG5443> of Judah <WG2448> were sealed <WG4972> twelve <WG1427> thousand <WG5505>: Of <WG1537> the tribe <WG5443> of Reuben <WG4502> twelve <WG1427> thousand <WG5505>; Of <WG1537> the tribe <WG5443> of Gad <WG1045> twelve <WG1427> thousand <WG5505>;

Of <WG1537> the tribe <WG5443> of Asher <WG768> twelve <WG1427> thousand <WG5505>; Of <WG1537> the tribe <WG5443> of Naphtali <WG3508> twelve <WG1427> thousand <WG5505>; Of <WG1537> the tribe <WG5443> of Manasseh <WG3128> twelve <WG1427> thousand <WG5505>;

After <WG3326> these things <WG5023> I saw <WG1492>, and <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, a great <WG4183> multitude <WG3793>, which <WG3739> no <WG3762> man <WG846> could <WG1410> number <WG705>, out of <WG1537> every <WG3956> nation <WG1484> and <WG2532> of all tribes <WG5443> and <WG2532> peoples <WG2992> and <WG2532> tongues <WG1100>, standing <WG2476> before <WG1799> the throne <WG2362> and <WG2532> before <WG1799> the Lamb <WG721>, arrayed <WG4016> in white <WG3022> robes <WG4749>, and <WG2532> palms <WG5404> in <WG1722> their <WG846> hands <WG5495>;

and <WG2532> they cry <WG2896> with a great <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, saying <WG3004>, Salvation <WG4991> unto our <WG2257> God <WG2316> who <WG3588> sitteth <WG2521> on <WG1909> the throne <WG2362>, and <WG2532> unto the Lamb <WG721>.

And <WG2532> all <WG3956> the angels <WG32> were standing <WG2476> round about <WG2945> the throne <WG2362>, and <WG2532> about the elders <WG4245> and <WG2532> the four <WG5064> living creatures <WG2226>; and <WG2532> they fell <WG4098> before <WG1799> the throne <WG2362> on <WG1909> their <WG846> faces <WG4383>, and <WG2532> worshipped <WG4352> God <WG2316>,

Amen <WG281>.

And <WG2532> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> the elders <WG4245> answered <WG611>, saying <WG3004> unto me <WG3427>, These <WG3778> that <WG5101> are <WG1526> arrayed <WG4016> in white <WG3022> robes <WG4749>, who are they <WG2532>, and whence came <WG2064> they <WG4159>?

And <WG2532> I say <WG2046> unto him <WG846>, My lord <WG2962>, thou <WG4771> knowest <WG1492>. They shall hunger <WG3983> no <WG3756> more <WG2089>, neither <WG3761> thirst <WG1372> any <WG3361> more <WG2089>; neither <WG3761> shall the sun <WG2246> strike <WG4098> upon <WG1909> them <WG846>, nor <WG3761> any <WG3956> heat <WG2738>:

for <WG3754> the Lamb <WG721> that <WG3588> is in <WG303> the midst <WG3319> of the throne <WG2362> shall be their <WG846> shepherd <WG4165>, and <WG2532> shall guide <WG3594> them <WG846> unto <WG1909> fountains <WG4077> of waters <WG5204> of life <WG2198>: and <WG2532> God <WG2316> shall wipe away <WG1813> every <WG3956> tear <WG1144> from <WG575> their <WG846> eyes <WG3788>.
